title: Require READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE; do actions onResume
message:
Require READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE; do actions onResume

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: required when opening files on some devices from some apps

SpeechActionActivity performs voice prompt, auto start, etc. onResume (instead of onStart as before): This is required when launching a dialog-like activity which returns by finishing itself. In this case onStart is not called. (Neither is onRestart.)

Both changes are experimental and might be dropped.

title: Fix build: Search keystore only if have password
message: Fix build: Search keystore only if have password

title: IME: change keyboard button behaviour
message:
IME: change keyboard button behaviour

New behaviour:

- single tap: switch to previous IME (before: next IME)
- long tap: switch to next IME (before: open IME chooser)

The IME chooser can now only be accessed from the system menu (keyboard button in the lower corner).

The new behaviour seems more useful as it improves compatibility with IMEs that do not support `switchToNextInputMethod`, as one can now switch back to them via a single tap.

It also simplifies switching between AnySoftKeyboard and K천nele provided that
https://github.com/AnySoftKeyboard/AnySoftKeyboard/issues/927 gets fixed.

title: Generalize rewrite rules, provide a UI to manage them, support more input EXTRAs (#44)
message:
Generalize rewrite rules, provide a UI to manage them, support more input EXTRAs (#44)

Highlights:

* Add up and down swipes

* Add boolean param to disable IME partial results (currently no GUI)

* Load rewrites also from SEND and VIEW intents

* Keep using singleLine=true if used with ellipsize. Using maxLines="1" and ellipsize caused crash on old devices, see https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=33868

* Support Intent (as JSON) as search query, Show error if intent launching fails

* Support Android 7.1 app shortcuts

* Show service icons in combo list activity

* Add voice prompt support

* Doc. Add diagram of intent-based communication

* Add more EXTRAs. Rewrite using EXTRAs before using rewrite table

* Add ChatDemoActivity (currently disabled)

* Support multiple rewrite tables

* Add FetchUrlActivity. Simple activity for making HTTP requests.

* Perform rewriting after disambiguation dialog

* Improve rewrites management UI

* Support android.provider.MediaStore.RECORD_SOUND. Experimental. Tested with Diktofon but didn't work.

title: Restore audio level if error in RecognitionService
message: Restore audio level if error in RecognitionService

title: Update version to 0.8.40
message: Update version to 0.8.40

title: Make it work with Google Chrome
message:
Make it work with Google Chrome

which does not seem to accept the results from the recognizer,
probably expecting it to perform the web search itself.
Chrome specifies the extras "WEB_SEARCH_ONLY" and "LANGUAGE_MODEL"="web_search",
but sets the action to "RECOGNIZE_SPEECH" (rather than "WEB_SEARCH"),
so maybe it's a bug in Chrome.

title: Sync RecognizerIntent.java (taken from 4.1.1_r1)
message: Sync RecognizerIntent.java (taken from 4.1.1_r1)

message: Some fixes

message: Update version to 0.8.38

message: Fix GUI bugs related to autostart and settings

title: Improve UI
message: Improve UI

title: Small improvements to how many results to deliver
message: Small improvements to how many results to deliver

message:
Show 5 best results in list dialog

and let the user to choose which result is sent on to web search.
This is the behaviour in case there is no calling activity.

(Needs still some cleanup.)

message: Stop recognizer when Settings is launched

message: Add "respect locale" setting (off by default)

message:
Add settings button to K6nele GUI

title: Add allowBackup=true (to satisfy lint)
message:
Add allowBackup=true (to satisfy lint)

+ minor changes

title: Rearrange the preferences activity
message: Rearrange the preferences activity

title: Not falling back to users's locale for input lang
message:
Not falling back to users's locale for input lang

Reverted the behaviour introduced in commit eb67b12037f42dab.
This is not backwards compatible with
situations where people use a non-Estonian locale
and an app that does not explicitly set the input language.

title: Clarify the exported parts of K6nele
message: Clarify the exported parts of K6nele

title: Improve input language selection (detection)
message: Improve input language selection (detection)

message: Minor cleanup

title: Improve About page
message: Improve About page

title: Parse "selectedLanguage" from input extras
message:
Parse "selectedLanguage" from input extras

and send it to the server if EXTRA_LANGUAGE is not set.
Some keyboard apps prefer to set "selectedLanguage" instead of
EXTRA_LANGUAGE.

Other changes:

  - communicate the value of EXTRA_PARTIAL_RESULTS to the server
  - fix regression from previous commit (results sometimes not returned)
  - more logging

title: Set default server by single tap
message:
Set default server by single tap

The previous solution (long tap + select from menu) was
too complicated.

title: Return complete transcription data to caller
message:
Return complete transcription data to caller

This includes for each hypothesis:

  - raw utterance
  - list of linearizations (output + lang)

title: Update version number to 0.8.30
message: Update version number to 0.8.30

title: Pause/silence audio during speech recognition
message:
Pause/silence audio during speech recognition

Corresponding bug report:

https://code.google.com/p/recognizer-intent/issues/detail?id=14

title: Now using only one prefs file to avoid confusion
message:
Now using only one prefs file to avoid confusion

This fixes the recent regression that the default recognizer service
could not be overridden.

title: Some cleanup
message: Some cleanup

title: Some cleanup + update to latest net-speech-api
message: Some cleanup + update to latest net-speech-api

title: Fix: server connection was not properly closed
message:
Fix: server connection was not properly closed

Defensively checking that the audio byte array is non-empty meant
that occasionally the final (closing) chunk was not sent and thus
the server connection was not closed properly. The user could observe
this as non-stable behaviour where occasionally the transcription was not
returned for no apparent reason. (These occasions became more frequent once
we started pushing chunks with a smaller time interval.)

title: Lower the values of chunk sending interval/delay
message: Lower the values of chunk sending interval/delay

title: Add error condition checks + cleaner vol measure
message: Add error condition checks + cleaner vol measure

title: Remove OnRecordPositionUpdateListener
message:
Remove OnRecordPositionUpdateListener

Maybe this makes recording work on the problematic devices
(Gio, Ace, LP P500).

title: Check getMinBufferSize return codes
message: Check getMinBufferSize return codes

title: Improve detection of failed recording +
message:
Improve detection of failed recording +

minor cleanup.

title: Cleanup based on lint
message: Cleanup based on lint

title: Fix some crashes and general cleanup
message:
Fix some crashes and general cleanup

Crashes related to dropping network connection
when using the SpeechRecognitionService.

title: Add volume level indicator to the UI
message:
Add volume level indicator to the UI

The volumei level images originate from the eyes-free project
(http://code.google.com/p/eyes-free/ : ime/latinime/res/).

Also fix rare IllegalStateException when stopping the recorder.

title: More responsive VU meter
message: More responsive VU meter

title: Fix: grammars could not be assigned to some apps
message:
Fix: grammars could not be assigned to some apps

Apps like iris and Dolphin Browser use the speech recognizer
via RecognitionService and nicely set the EXTRA_CALLING_PACKAGE.
K6nele ignored it and instead tried to identify these apps via
the undocumented embedded "packageName" extra that the keyboard apps
usually set, but in the case of non-keyboard apps it is usually not set.

Otherwise minor cleanup.

title: Fix typo
message: Fix typo

title: Add more meaningful user-agent comment
message: Add more meaningful user-agent comment

title: Update version number
message: Update version number

title: Add support for action GET_LANGUAGE_DETAILS
message:
Add support for action GET_LANGUAGE_DETAILS

The nice thing is that Google Translate now displays the
microphone button next to the Estonian input box.

However, it does not display the microphone button for any other
languages anymore, even if Google Voice Search is set to be
the default. This looks like a bug in Google Translate (or
Google Voice Search).

message: Now only package names end up in Apps-list

Add support for EXTRA_PHRASE +

Plus some cleanup of how the user-agent comment is compiled.

because this is known to result in low quality transcription.

message:
Improve Estonian help page

Fix some spelling mistakes
which the Eclipse plugin pretty-printer had created, removing
the first character of some strings (for some unknown reason).

Describe Speaktoit+Alarm as a possible use case for grammar-based
speech recognition.

Several fixes/improvements

  - a few NPEs
  - waveform disappeared on orientation change
  - add prompt for web search
  - add explicit state checks
  - handling max recording time

message: Improve error management

message:

  - add service state diagram

title: Some fixes
message: Some fixes

title: Add launcher which performs websearch
message:
Add launcher which performs websearch

There is now a launcher icon. Clicking on it will open the
recognizer UI but the recognition results are passed
to the standard websearch (because there is no calling activity).
This should solve the confusion with K6nele having no "start button".

(Additionally minor fixes here and there.)

title: Some fixes + cleanup
message: Some fixes + cleanup

title: Some cleanup (but still broken)
message: Some cleanup (but still broken)

title: Make a separate recorder/transcriber service
message:
Make a separate recorder/transcriber service

to make it possible to rotate the device during recording/transcribing.

title: Handle NO_MATCH within the K6nele GUI
message:
Handle NO_MATCH within the K6nele GUI

instead of returning it to the caller.

title: Change some (font) sizes
message:
Change some (font) sizes

to be compatible with the recommendations of
http://developer.android.com/design/

title: Improve the performance of the recorder
message:
Improve the performance of the recorder

There is much less array copying now.
Longer recordings on HTC Wildfire work better now
but low level recorder buffer overflows still remain unsolved
(see: http://code.google.com/p/recognizer-intent/issues/detail?id=21).

title: Simplify setting of recorder buffersize and period
message:
Simplify setting of recorder buffersize and period

Buffer size is now always calculated on the basis of the minimal
buffer size. This maybe improves compatibility with different
devices.

title: Hide Stop-button if Autostop is enabled
message:
Hide Stop-button if Autostop is enabled

This should make the UI more clear.

title: Make sample rate configurable
message: Make sample rate configurable

title: Some cleanup of the recorder code
message: Some cleanup of the recorder code

title: Add intent-filter android.speech.action.WEB_SEARCH
message:
Add intent-filter android.speech.action.WEB_SEARCH

Hoped that filtering for this intent makes us compatible
with the Google Search Widget but this didn't happen.
Google Search Widget is unfortunately locked to use Google Voice Search.

Also did some minor cleanup in the demo code.
